msg_text:
dxp-demo-menu-news
Screen tile group with hidden header. 7 tiles, 1 big 12x8 tile and 6 small 4x1 tiles.
  • 12x8 tile: The style class nepDxpDemoNewsMaster has been added to the tile, it reverses card content the flex direction, positioning the title & sub title at the tile bottom. A tile layout with a bottom-up image mask, makes the tile title/sub title stand out against the background image.
  • 4x1: Tiles with a title and icon. Tile layout with 4x1 size and icon placement allign-with-title-left has controls the tile look'n'feel
